snippet: Tigers pitcher Al Alburquerque kissed the baseball before throwing to first in a crucial playoff situation, a move that evoked memories of Mark Fidrych’s antics in the 1970s.
abstract: Detroit Tigers pitcher Al Alburquerque kissed the baseball before throwing to first in a crucial playoff situation, a move that evoked memories of Mark Fidrych’s antics in the 1970s.

byline.contributor: Jason Turbow contributed reporting from Oakland, Calif.

lead_paragraph: Tigers pitcher Al Alburquerque kissed the baseball before throwing to first in a crucial playoff situation, a move that evoked memories of Mark Fidrych’s antics in the 1970s.

headline.seo: Alburquerque’s Kiss Evokes Memories of Tigers’ Fidrych
headline.main: Kiss Evokes Era When a Tigers Pitcher Only Talked to the Ball
